mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zhenghe_version a
WHERE a.type = #{type} order by version_code+0 desc limit 0,1
mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.version_name AS "versionName", a.version_code AS "versionCode", a.url AS "url", a.channel AS "channel", a.description AS "description", a.type AS "type", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.delete_mark AS "deleteMark", a.remark AS "remark", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.mender AS "mender", a.creator AS "creator"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zhenghe_version a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zhenghe_version( id, version_name, version_code, url, channel, description, type, create_date, delete_mark, remark, update_date, mender, creator ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{versionName}, #{versionCode}, #{url}, #{channel}, #{description}, #{type}, #{createDate}, #{deleteMark}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{mender}, #{creator} )
mapper.update: UPDATE zhenghe_version SET version_name = #{versionName}, version_code = #{versionCode}, url = #{url}, channel = #{channel}, description = #{description}, type = #{type}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
